summary: Feature request to allow users to set a Temporalio::Cancellation for client RPC calls in the Ruby SDK, enabling cancellation of in-flight client operations.
userImpact: Users cannot currently cancel in-flight client RPC calls, limiting control over long-running operations.
proposedFix: Implement support for setting Temporalio::Cancellation on client calls
keyQuote: Need to allow users to set a `Temporalio::Cancellation` for client calls
